sys_email_layout.advanced_layout:
<html>
<head>
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"/>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto"/>
<style>

body {
  font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
}

/* Responsive columns */
/* On screens that are 600px wide or more switch to 600px */
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) {
  div.container {
    width: 600px;
  }
}

/* On screens that are 600px wide or less switch to 375px */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
 div.container {
    width: 375px;
  }
}

.card-header-black {
  background-color: black !important;
  color : white;
}
.btn-primary {
  background-color:#0378D6 !important;
  font-size: 10px !important;
}
	
.nopadding {
 padding: 0px!important;
}
.full {
 width: 100%;
}
div.card-body {
       padding-left: 0px !important;
       padding-right: 0px !important;;
    }
.reminder-header {
	font-size: 15px;
	font-weight: bold;
}		
.reminder-footer {
	padding-left: 20%;
}
.reminder-icon {
	padding-left: 48%;
}

.reminder-footer-text {
	font-size: 9px;
	text-align: left;
}	
.reminder-content-text {
	font-size: 12px;
	padding: 2;
    margin: 0;
}	
.reminder-content-label {
	font-size: 9px;
	font-weight: bold;
	padding: 2;
    margin: 0;
}
.card-image-status {
  fill: #0378D6;
  background-color:#0378D6 ;
  border-radius: 50%;	
}
.reminder-status {
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background: #0378D6;
    color: white;
    text-align:center;
    padding: 1px;
}
</style>
</head>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/css/bootstrap.min.css"/>
<body>
 ${notification:body}
</body>	
</html>
